thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com
thread.title: Tom Sykes

author: Tom Sykes
title: Tom Sykes
text: Not a month goes past without me having to contact GoDaddy to get help with a fault with my managed Wordpress site. I'm always being knocked off-line for at least a day with an "Error establishing a database connection" issue. Staff aren't that helpful, usually have it wait for the issue to fix itself and never is resolved with one phone call. No refunds or compensation for loss of business either which is a kick in the teeth.
